Title: Udhaharanam Sujatha
Actors: Manju Warrier, Anaswara Rajan, Nedumudi Venu, Joju George
Plot: Sujatha, who juggles menial jobs to afford her daughter's education. But her daughter neglects studies, thinking that she'll end doing odd jobs just like her mother. Things take a comical turn, when Sujatha does something out of the blue.
